title: Imouto sae Ireba Ii.
alternative_title: A Sister's All You Need, 妹さえいればいい。
description: This is the story about the daily life of a young siscon novelist, Itsuki Hashima with his perfect little sister Chihiro, the genius illustrator Nayuta Kani, his best friend Miyako Shirakawa and some insane partners from his publishers.
